name: Píďalka Surf
description:
2018-01-14

"Píďalka" means "small worm" in Czech.

I was just trying out state animator in Unity and also making and texturing all the 3D models for the third first time. Lagging, buggy endless forest. Do tricks, gain score, don't download this, please.

Controls:
WASD - Direction of movement
Mouse - Rotate view
Hold Ctrl - The ancient tablet
Space - Jump
Shift - Speed
Esc - End the suffering
Alt+F4 - End the suffering faster
